title: Ticket #4578: condor_config_should not stop at the first undefined value
description:
condor_config_val currently stops at the first undefined value. this makes it impossible to probe for a set of values with a single command. It should instead just spit out a line indicating the the value is undefined, something like this: 

    > condor_config_val daemon_list schedd_host schedd_name
    DAEMON_LIST = MASTER STARTD SCHEDD
    #SCHEDD_HOST is not defined
    SCHEDD_NAME = had-schedd@
creator: johnkn
